resources.string: The default pilight configuration mentions 5000 for the port number. Only IP or hostname, respectively the address of your Raspberry has no default value. For further information consult http://wiki.pilight.org/doku.php/settings
Sorry, this is an unknown error
Connection failed! Please reconsider your host and/or port setting
Your Raspberry closed the connection, try reconnecting
Connection failed! There seem to be a problem with your Raspberry
